asteroids.sovelluslogiikka

Class Physics

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.sovelluslogiikka.Physics

  • public class Physics
extends Object
    Handles the physics and running of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Physics(int width, int height)
      Sets the height and width limits to the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accelerate(VectorShape v)
      Calculates the change to VelX and VelY depending on the shapes facing direction.
      int calculateScore()
      Calculates the score by multiplying it by game speed, and returns the answer.
      void collisionCount()
      Tests for collisions between the ship and the asteroids, and between all lasers and the asteroids.
      void deadRemoval()
      Removes all lasers and asteroids from their corresponding arrays, given if their alive status is false;
      void decelerate(VectorShape v)
      Calculates the change to VelX and VelY depending on the inverse of the shapes facing direction.

      Applys the method movement to every VectorShape still present.

      void setLevelup(boolean levelup) 
      void setupShip()
      Puts the ship in its starting position.
      void shipInputReaction()
      This method checks the booleans for the turning and moving of the ship, which are controlled by an keylistener.
      void shoot()
      Creates a laser at the ships position, giving it its direction according to the ships facing direction.
      void spawnAsteroids()
      Spawns asteroids corresponding to the parameter asteroidAmount, and give them their starting positions and velocities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Physics

        public Physics(int width,
       int height)
        Sets the height and width limits to the given parameters. Creates the ship, and sets it in its place.
        Parameters:
        width -
        height -

    • Method Detail

      • setupShip

        public void setupShip()
        Puts the ship in its starting position.

      • spawnAsteroids

        public void spawnAsteroids()
        Spawns asteroids corresponding to the parameter asteroidAmount, and give them their starting positions and velocities.

      • collisionCount

        public void collisionCount()
        Tests for collisions between the ship and the asteroids, and between all lasers and the asteroids. With a collision, alive is set to false, and in case of destroyed asteroids, the score is raised.

      • deadRemoval

        public void deadRemoval()
        Removes all lasers and asteroids from their corresponding arrays, given if their alive status is false;

      • roundOfMovement

        public void roundOfMovement()
        Applys the method movement to every VectorShape still present.

      • movement

        public void movement(VectorShape v)
        Adds the velX and velY of the object v, to its coordinatesx and y respectively. If the new x or y were to be out of bounds, the method wraps the x or y to the opposite side of the field.
        Parameters:
        v -

      • shipInputReaction

        public void shipInputReaction()
        This method checks the booleans for the turning and moving of the ship, which are controlled by an keylistener. If true, the corresponding methods are called.

      • accelerate

        public void accelerate(VectorShape v)
        Calculates the change to VelX and VelY depending on the shapes facing direction. If the two vectors hypotenuse is over 20^2, nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        v -

      • decelerate

        public void decelerate(VectorShape v)
        Calculates the change to VelX and VelY depending on the inverse of the shapes facing direction. If the two vectors hypotenuse is over 20^2, nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        v -

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        Creates a laser at the ships position, giving it its direction according to the ships facing direction.

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore()
        Calculates the score by multiplying it by game speed, and returns the answer.
        Returns:
        score

        public ArrayList<Asteroid> getAsteroids()
